title: Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit 2014 720p DTS CHD DUAL ANGELiC
description:
Jack Ryan ( Chris Pine ) studying in London when the World Trade Center collapsed due to a terrorist attack occurred on September 11, 2001 . Amercano Serving the army, he participated in the Afghanistan War , and there suffers a serious accident in the column. During recovery in the hospital he meets Dr. Cathy ( Keira Knightley ) , with whom he falls in love . In this period he receives a visit from Thomas Harper ( Kevin Cosnter ) , who works for the CIA and recommends that Ryan will return to the doctorate in economics . He follows the advice and , from then on , he began to work secretly for the CIA , without even know Cathy . Amid the investigation , Jack discovers a plot orchestrated in Russia , which can install the financial chaos in the United States . With that , he travels to Moscow with the aim of investigating Viktor Cheverin ( Kenneth Branagh ) , the leader of the operation .
